scene: Muscle Beach outdoor gym - Venice Beach - 1987 DAWN

camera_position.starts: Wide shot - Rex exercising, Jessica on jeep hood
camera_position.movement: Slow push in, then WHIP PAN to vans arriving
camera_position.ends: Medium shot - Vladimir in sedan chair facing Rex

environment.primary_location: Muscle Beach outdoor gym at sunrise
key_elements: Military jeep with Jessica sitting on hood studying
Black tactical vehicles arriving on beach

REX_THUNDER_ARMSTRONG.wardrobe: Army PT shorts, dog tags, no shirt, red bandana

JESSICA_ARMSTRONG.position: ALWAYS on jeep hood with textbooks

SEÃ‘OR_VLADIMIR.description: Mysterious crime boss and aikido master
SEÃ‘OR_VLADIMIR.wardrobe: White linen suit (XXXL), gold chains, panama hat
SEÃ‘OR_VLADIMIR.appearance: OBVIOUSLY PAINTED-ON BLACK HAIR, thin mustache
SEÃ‘OR_VLADIMIR.transportation: Carried in ornate sedan chair by four men
SEÃ‘OR_VLADIMIR.voice: ACCENTED MALE VOICE WITH MOUTH FULL

VLADIMIR'S_MEN.wardrobe: ALL wearing matching black tactical gear - black pants, black shirts, black boots, tactical vests
VLADIMIR'S_MEN.appearance: Various ages 25-45, all male, professional soldiers
VLADIMIR'S_MEN.sedan_chair_carriers: Four strongest men struggling with Vladimir's weight

BEACH_BACKGROUND.other_people: Beach is EMPTY except for main characters

sequence_breakdown.visual: REX doing one-arm pull-ups at beach gym, military dog tags swinging, glistening with sweat. JESSICA sits on jeep hood reading organic chemistry textbook
Black tactical vehicles screech onto beach. REX drops from pull-up bar, combat ready. JESSICA looks up from book. Men in black tactical gear exit vehicles
REX stands protectively between vehicles and JESSICA, military stance. JESSICA still on jeep hood watching
sequence_breakdown.speaker: REX

sequence_breakdown.visual: JESSICA on jeep hood, book down, concerned face looking at REX. REX maintains defensive position
sequence_breakdown.speaker: JESSICA

sequence_breakdown.visual: Sedan chair emerges from vehicle. Four men in black tactical gear struggle carrying enormous VLADIMIR who is eating whole roasted chicken. Grease on face, painted hair obvious
VLADIMIR in sedan chair facing REX, takes huge bite of chicken, speaks with mouth full. REX tense, military ready
sequence_breakdown.speaker: VLADIMIR
sequence_breakdown.voice_type: ACCENTED MALE VOICE WITH MOUTH FULL

dialogue_summary.line_3: VLADIMIR says 'Buenos dias, soldier boy' at 00:00:07:06

visual_requirements: Jessica ALWAYS visible on jeep hood
Vladimir's PAINTED BLACK HAIR obviously fake
Four men STRUGGLING with chair weight
